name: electricity, high voltage, renewable energy products, production mix | electricity, high voltage, renewable energy products | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/26683/documentation

The shares of electricity technologies on this market are valid for the year 2021. They have been calculated by the data provider and don't necessarily correspond with the production volumes entered in the undefined datasets of the different electricity producers. The shares have been calculated based on statistics from 2021: Swiss Federal Office of Energy SFOE, Swiss Electricity Statistics 2021; (https://www.bfe.admin.ch/bfe/en/home.html).
